title: Measuring DNS Censorship of Generative AI Platforms
abstract:
Generative AI is an invaluable tool, however, in some parts of the world,
this technology is censored due to political or societal issues. In this work,
we monitor Generative AI censorship through the DNS protocol. We find China to
be a leading country of Generative AI censorship. Interestingly, China does not
censor all AI domain names. We also report censorship in Russia and find
inconsistencies in their process. We compare our results to other measurement
platforms (OONI, Censored Planet, GFWatch), and present their lack of data on
Generative AI domains.
